subject: Basketball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Dennis Johnson, who died of a heart attack in 2007, was inducted into the Naismith Memorial Hall of Fame and is remembered for a layup in the 1987 playoffs.
snippet: Dennis Johnson, who died of a heart attack in 2007, was inducted into the Naismith Memorial Hall of Fame and is remembered for a layup in the 1987 playoffs.
